data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
data.editorText: refl,

data.lean: lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
data.editorText:
rw [
 add_succ a 0,
 add_zero a
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with k hk,
rw add_zero 0,
refl,
rw [
  add_succ 0 k,
  hk
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with k hk,
rw [
  add_zero b,
  add_zero (a + b)
],
refl,
rw [
  add_succ (a + b) k,
  add_succ b k,
  add_succ a (b + k),
  hk
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with k hk,
rw [
  add_zero (succ a),
  add_zero a
],
refl,
rw [
  add_succ (succ a) k,
  add_succ a k,
  hk
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with k hk,
rw [
  add_zero a,
  zero_add a
],
refl,
rw [
  add_succ a k,
  succ_add k a,
  hk
],
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw [
  one_eq_succ_zero,
  add_succ n 0,
  add_zero n
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
rw [
  add_assoc a b c,
  add_comm b c,
  ← add_assoc a c b
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with k hk,
rw mul_zero 0,
refl,
rw [
  mul_succ 0 k,
  add_zero (0 * k),
  hk
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
rw [
  one_eq_succ_zero, 
  mul_succ m 0,
  mul_zero m,
  zero_add m
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
induction m with k hk,
rw mul_zero (succ 0),
refl,
rw [
  mul_succ (succ 0) k,
  hk,
  add_succ k 0,
  add_zero k
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with k hk,
rw [
  add_zero a,
  mul_zero t,
  add_zero (t * a)
],
refl,
rw [
  add_succ a k,
  mul_succ t (a + k),
  mul_succ t k,
  ← add_assoc (t * a) (t * k) t,
  hk
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with k hk,
rw [
  mul_zero (a * b),
  mul_zero b,
  mul_zero a
],
refl,
rw [
  mul_succ (a * b) k,
  mul_succ b k,
  hk,
  ← mul_add a (b * k) b
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with k hk,
rw [
  mul_zero (succ a),
  mul_zero a,
  add_zero 0
],
refl,
rw [
  mul_succ (succ a) k,
  add_succ (a * succ k) k,
  mul_succ a k,
  hk,
  add_succ (a * k + k) a,
  add_assoc (a * k) k a,
  add_comm k a,
  ← add_assoc (a * k) a k
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction t with k hk,
rw [
  mul_zero (a + b),
  mul_zero a,
  mul_zero b,
  add_zero 0
],
refl,
rw [
  mul_succ (a + b) k,
  mul_succ a k,
  mul_succ b k,
  hk,
  add_assoc (a * k) a (b * k + b),
  add_comm a (b * k + b),
  add_assoc (b * k) b a,
  add_comm b a,
  ← add_assoc (a * k) (b * k) (a + b)
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with k hk,
rw [
  mul_zero a,
  zero_mul a
],
refl,
rw [
  mul_succ a k,
  succ_mul k a,
  hk
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
rw [
  ← mul_assoc a b c,
  mul_comm a b,
  mul_assoc b a c
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_zero 0,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw [
  pow_succ 0 m,
  mul_zero (0 ^ m)
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
data.editorText:
rw [
  one_eq_succ_zero,
  pow_succ a 0,
  pow_zero a,
  one_mul a
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with k hk,
rw pow_zero 1,
refl,
rw [
  pow_succ 1 k,
  hk,
  mul_one 1
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with k hk,
rw [
  add_zero m,
  pow_zero a,
  mul_one (a ^ m)
],
refl,
rw [
  add_succ m k,
  pow_succ a (m + k),
  hk,
  pow_succ a k,
  mul_assoc (a ^ m) (a ^ k) a
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with k hk,
rw [
  pow_zero (a * b),
  pow_zero a,
  pow_zero b,
  mul_one 1
],
refl,
rw [
  pow_succ (a * b) k,
  pow_succ a k,
  pow_succ b k,
  hk,
  mul_assoc (a ^ k) a (b ^ k * b),
  mul_comm a (b ^ k * b),
  mul_assoc (b ^ k) b a,
  mul_comm b a,
  ← mul_assoc (a ^ k) (b ^ k) (a * b)
],
refl,

data.lean: lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=
data.editorText:
induction n with k hk,
rw [
  pow_zero (a ^ m),
  mul_zero m,
  pow_zero a
],
refl,
rw [
  pow_succ (a ^ m) k,
  hk,
  mul_succ m k,
  pow_add a (m * k) m
],
refl,

data.lean:
lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
data.editorText:
rw [
  two_eq_succ_one, 
  one_eq_succ_zero,
  pow_succ (a + b) (succ 0),
  pow_succ (a + b) 0,
  pow_succ a (succ 0),
  pow_succ a 0,
  pow_succ b (succ 0),
  pow_succ b 0,
  pow_zero (a + b),
  one_mul (a + b),
  pow_zero a,
  one_mul a,
  pow_zero b,
  one_mul b,
  mul_add (a + b) a b,
  add_mul a b a,
  add_mul a b b,
  mul_comm b a,
  add_comm (a * b) (b * b),
  add_assoc (a * a) (a * b) (b * b + a * b),
  add_comm (a * b) (b * b + a * b),
  add_assoc (b * b) (a * b) (a * b),
  ← add_assoc (a * a) (b * b) (a * b + a * b),
  succ_mul (succ 0) a,
  succ_mul 0 a,
  zero_mul a,
  zero_add a,
  add_mul a a b
],
refl,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h p,

data.lean: example : mynat → mynat :=
data.editorText:
intro n,
exact 5*n+3,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q: Q := h p,
have t: T := j q,
have u : U := l t,
exact u,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q: Q := h p,
have t: T := j q,
have u : U := l t,
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro hpqr,
intro hpq,
intro p,
have hqr: (Q → R) := hpqr p,
have q : Q := hpq p,
have r: R := hqr q,
exact r,

data.lean: example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
data.editorText:
intro hpq,
intro hqf,
intro p,
have f: F := hqf (hpq p),
exact f,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=
data.editorText:
intro hpq,
intro hq_,
intro p,
apply hq_,
have q: Q := hpq p,
exact q,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
have b: B := f1 a,
have e: E := f2 b,
have f: F := f5 e,
have g: G := f8 f,
have j: J := f9 g,
have i: I := f11 j,
have l: L := f15 i,
exact l,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h p,

data.lean: lemma imp_self (P : Prop) : P → P :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
exact p,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q: Q := h p,
have t: T := j q,
have u: U := l t,
exact u,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q: Q := h p,
have t: T := j q,
have u: U := l t,
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros hpqr hpq p,
apply hpqr,
exact p,
apply hpq,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intros hpq hqr p,
apply hqr,
apply hpq,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
intro hpq,
intro hnotq,
intro p,
have q: Q := hpq p,
exact hnotq q,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
exact a,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact p,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
split,
exact q,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
data.editorText:
intros hpq hqr,
split,
cases hpq with p q,
exact p,
cases hqr with q r,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intros h1 h2,
cases h1 with hpq hqp,
cases h2 with hqr hrq,
split,
intro p,
exact hqr (hpq p),
intro r,
exact hqp (hrq r),

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intros h1 h2,
split,
intro p,
exact h2.1 (h1.1 p),
intro r,
exact h1.2 (h2.2 r),

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
data.editorText:
intro q,
right,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
right,
exact p,
left,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro hpqr,
cases hpqr with p hqr,
cases hqr with q r,
left,
split,
exact p,
exact q,
right,
split,
exact p,
exact r,
intro hpqpr,
cases hpqpr with hpq hpr,
split,
exact hpq.1,
left,
exact hpq.2,
split,
exact hpr.1,
right,
exact hpr.2,

data.lean: lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
data.editorText:
intro hpnotp,
cases hpnotp with p notp,
exfalso,
apply notp,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
data.editorText:
intro hnotqnotp,
by_cases p : P; by_cases q : Q,
intro p,
exact q,
exfalso,
have notp2: ¬P := hnotqnotp q,
exact notp2 p,
intro p',
exact q,
intro p'',
exfalso,
exact p p'',

data.lean: theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
have hab: (a = b) := succ_inj hs,
exact hab,

data.lean: theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
have hsasb: (succ a = succ b) := succ_inj h,
exact succ_inj hsasb,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
intro hab,
rw hab,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact succ_inj,
exact succ_eq_succ_of_eq,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
induction t with k hk,
rw [
  add_zero a,
  add_zero b
] at h,
exact h,
rw [
  add_succ a k,
  add_succ b k
] at h,
exact hk (succ_inj h),

data.lean: theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw [
  add_comm t a,
  add_comm t b
] at h,
exact add_right_cancel a t b h,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact add_right_cancel a t b,
intro h,
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
exact add_left_cancel a b 0 h,
--have hlc: (a + b = a → b = 0) := add_left_cancel a b 0,
--exact hcl h,

data.lean: theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
symmetry,
exact zero_ne_succ a,

data.lean: lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b with d,
refl,
rw add_succ a d at H,
exfalso,
have notH: (succ (a + d) ≠ 0) := succ_ne_zero (a + d),
exact notH H,

data.lean: lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw add_comm a b at h,
exact add_left_eq_zero h,

data.lean: theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
data.editorText:
rw ← succ_eq_add_one d,
refl,

data.lean: lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw [
  ← add_zero n,
  ← add_succ n 0
] at h,
have h': (0 = succ 0) := add_left_cancel n 0 (succ 0) h,
apply zero_ne_succ 0,
exact h',

data.lean: theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
intros hanz hbnz habz,
cases b with d,
rw mul_zero a at habz,
exact hbnz habz,
rw mul_succ a d at habz,
have haz: (a = 0) := add_left_eq_zero habz,
exact hanz haz,

data.lean:
theorem eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero (a b : mynat) (h : a * b = 0) :
  a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b with d,
rw mul_zero a at h,
right,
exact h,
rw mul_succ a d at h,
have haz: (a = 0) := add_left_eq_zero h,
left,
exact haz,

data.lean: theorem mul_eq_zero_iff (a b : mynat): a * b = 0 ↔ a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro habz,
exact eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero a b habz,
intro hazbz,
cases hazbz with haz hbz,
rw [
  haz,
  zero_mul b
],
refl,
rw [
  hbz,
  mul_zero a
],
refl,

data.lean: theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
data.editorText:
induction c with k hk generalizing b,
intro h,
rw mul_zero a at h,
have hab: (a = 0 ∨ b = 0) := eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero a b h,
cases hab with haz hbz,
exfalso,
exact ha haz,
exact hbz,
intro h',
cases b,
rw mul_zero a at h',
symmetry at h',
have haz': (a = 0) := add_left_eq_zero h',
exfalso,
exact ha haz',
rw [
  mul_succ a b,
  mul_succ a k
] at h',
have habak: (a * b = a * k) := add_right_cancel (a * b) a (a * k) h',
have hbk: (b = k) := hk b habak,
exact succ_eq_succ_of_eq hbk,

data.lean: lemma one_add_le_self (x : mynat) : x ≤ 1 + x :=
data.editorText:
--rw le_iff_exists_add x (1 + x),
use 1,
rw add_comm 1 x,

data.lean: lemma le_refl (x : mynat) : x ≤ x :=
data.editorText:
use 0,
rw add_zero x,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_succ (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b → a ≤ (succ b) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with c hc,
use (succ c),
rw add_succ a c,
exact succ_eq_succ_of_eq hc,

data.lean: lemma zero_le (a : mynat) : 0 ≤ a :=
data.editorText:
use a,
rw zero_add a,
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_trans (a b c : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hbc : b ≤ c) : a ≤ c :=
data.editorText:
cases hab with d hd,
cases hbc with e he,
rw hd at he, 
use (d + e),
rw [
  ← add_assoc a d e,
  he
],
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_antisymm (a b : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hba : b ≤ a) : a = b :=
data.editorText:
cases hab with c hbac,
cases hba with d habd,
rw [
  hbac,
  add_assoc a c d
] at habd,
symmetry at habd,
have hcdz: (c + d = 0) := eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self habd,
have hcz: (c = 0) := add_right_eq_zero hcdz,
rw [
  hcz,
  add_zero a
] at hbac,
symmetry at hbac,
exact hbac,

data.lean: lemma le_zero (a : mynat) (h : a ≤ 0) : a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases h with c hc,
symmetry at hc,
exact add_right_eq_zero hc,

data.lean: lemma succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) (h : a ≤ b) : succ a ≤ succ b :=
data.editorText:
cases h with c hc,
use c,
rw succ_add a c,
exact succ_eq_succ_of_eq hc,

data.lean: theorem le_total (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∨ b ≤ a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd generalizing a,
right,
exact zero_le a,
cases a,
left,
use (succ d),
rw zero_add (succ d),
refl,
have h: (a ≤ d ∨ d ≤ a) := hd a,
cases h with had hda,
left,
exact succ_le_succ a d had,
right,
exact succ_le_succ d a hda,

data.lean: lemma le_succ_self (a : mynat) : a ≤ succ a :=
data.editorText:
have h: (a ≤ a) := le_refl a,
exact le_succ a a h,

data.lean: theorem add_le_add_right {a b : mynat} : a ≤ b → ∀ t, (a + t) ≤ (b + t) :=
data.editorText:
intro hab,
intro t,
cases hab with c hc,
use c,
rw [
  hc,
  add_assoc a t c,
  add_comm t c,
  ← add_assoc a c t
],
refl,

data.lean: theorem le_of_succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ succ b → a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
intro hs,
cases hs with c hc,
rw succ_add a c at hc,
use c,
exact succ_inj hc,

data.lean: theorem not_succ_le_self (a : mynat) : ¬ (succ a ≤ a) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
have ha: (a ≤ succ a) := le_succ_self a,
have hasa: (a = succ a) := le_antisymm a (succ a) ha h,
have hnasa: (a ≠ succ a) := ne_succ_self a,
exact hnasa hasa,

data.lean:
theorem add_le_add_left {a b : mynat} (h : a ≤ b) (t : mynat) :
  t + a ≤ t + b :=
data.editorText:
have ht: ((a + t) ≤ (b + t)) := add_le_add_right h t,
cases ht with c hc,
use c,
rw [
  add_comm t b,
  add_comm t a
],
exact hc,

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_one (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) → succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with hab hnba,
cases hab with c hc,
cases c with d,
rw add_zero a at hc,
rw hc at hnba,
have ha: (a ≤ a) := le_refl a,
exfalso,
exact hnba ha,
use d,
rw add_succ a d at hc,
rw succ_add a d,
exact hc,

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_two (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ b → a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) :=
data.editorText:
intro hsab,
split,
have hasa: (a ≤ succ a) := le_succ_self a,
have hab: (a ≤ b) := le_trans a (succ a) b hasa hsab,
exact hab,
intro hba,
have hsaa: (succ a ≤ a) := le_trans (succ a) b a hsab hba,
have hnsaa: ¬(succ a ≤ a) := not_succ_le_self a,
exact hnsaa hsaa,

data.lean: lemma lt_iff_succ_le (a b : mynat) : a < b ↔ succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact lt_aux_one a b,
exact lt_aux_two a b,
